content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of Iron Ore, and my inventory now reflects this change. 
# The next step is to smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Plates using a Stone Furnace.

# Since I need a Stone Furnace to smelt the ore, I will now craft one. 
# I need to ensure I have the necessary materials to craft the Stone Furnace, which requires 3 Stone.

# First, I will check my inventory to see if I have any Stone. If I don't have any, I will need to gather some from the nearby area.

inventory = inspect_inventory()  # Check the current inventory to see if I have Stone.
if inventory.get(Prototype.Stone, 0) < 3:
    # If I don't have enough stone, I will need to harvest some.
    stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Locate the nearest stone resource.
    if stone_position:
        move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the stone resource position.
        harvested_stone = harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=3)  # Harvest 3 Stone.
else:
    # If I have enough stone, I can proceed to craft the Stone Furnace.
    craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Craft the Stone Furnace.
